alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 12:16PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lander and west central Eureka Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1214 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crescent Valley, moving east southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
